wiki.content:
Motif is 7/8 time, executed briskly enough that the feel can also be that of  3/4 with each measure sounding hitched or hung up temporarily on an extra-large or extra-heavy last beat. Starts with sparse percussion and finger-snapping alone, and explores the 7/8 idea (and the melodic ideas Brubeck superimposes) without going so in-depth that the listener starts to forget what the original simple idea was.
        
User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.
wiki.summary: Motif is 7/8 time, executed briskly enough that the feel can also be that of  3/4 with each measure sounding hitched or hung up temporarily on an extra-large or extra-heavy last beat. Starts with sparse percussion and finger-snapping alone, and explores the 7/8 idea (and the melodic ideas Brubeck superimposes) without going so in-depth that the listener starts to forget what the original simple idea was.

name: Unsquare Dance
comments: So far everything I've heard has been a pure delight! Great job!
Most of our great-grandkids won't know or care who we were, but music lives forever.
R.I.P ... you will live forever in your music
Loving the beat of the 7/8 time signature!
was the opening theme for austrian television (ORF) series Panoptikum in the 70s
been looking for this tune for ages, thanks last fm
Jazz for people who don't like jazz. That'll be me then.
Ритмически - крайне выразительно! Блеать, меня сносит..

se me dizem que o compasso desta música é 7/4, eu não só aceito como não discuto: não tenho ouvido algum para jazz, mas muita disposição para ficar intrigado. "unsquare dance" me parece tão simples e eficiente, e creio que brubeck ganha menos crédito do que merece por conta de cretinos como eu, que acha tudo o que ele faz de uma limpidez e pureza inigualáveis. são dois dos minutos mais deliciosos da sua vida.
